title: (x) Division - Deftone Stylus {Romesh}
content:
looks like a handdrawn font of the predigital era.   
you might try it with monotype script or fenway park.   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/monotype-script/script-mt-bold/testdrive.html?s=Division&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000343/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/monotype-script/script-mt-bold/testdrive.html?s=Division&p=48)   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jukebox/fenway-park-jf/fenway-park-jf/testdrive.html?s=Division&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000343/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jukebox/fenway-park-jf/fenway-park-jf/testdrive.html?s=Division&p=48)   
   
team spirit and deftone stylus (dafont.com) are for free.
author: nike

comments.content: We had this one [a few days ago](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000343/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/15064.html?1062192382).
